title: Giving RP Away For X-Mas Come Get it.
body:
Comment your username and if I get 25 yes's ill Give out 25$ worth of RP untill I have spent 300$ to the people that commented on this post by Tomorrow night for X-mas. 

Remember to upvote

Edit: Also Pay it forward and make a nice post on GD for a change. 
@Riot I challenge you to do the same, Ho Ho Ho
